Brainmeasures Test Platform

You Must have to give this test in Google Chrome Browser

The very first step is to use Google chrome browser to give Brainmeasures Test, Other browsers like Mozilla, safari, etc do not supports with our Proctor system, So you must have to use Chrome browser. If you are not having chrome then you can download it from given below Link.

Download Google Chrome

Your system must have fullfil this Technical Requirements for Proctor testing

Given below the Minimum and recommended Technical Requirements for Proctor Testing, Please check twice before go ahead.

MINIMUM RECOMMENDED
Web Camera 640x480 resolution 1280x720 resolution
Windows Users Windows Vista Windows 8
Mac Users Version 10.5: "Leopard" Version 10.8: "Mountain Lion"
Internet Download Speed .768 Mbps 1.5 Mbps
Internet Upload Speed .384 Mbps 1 Mbps
RAM 1024 MB 2 GB
Port 1935, UDP/TCP 1935, UDP/TCP
Microphone - -

NOTE: At this time we do not support the Google Chromebook, Andorid Tablets, iPad, Linux OS, Microsoft Surface, etc. however, we are working on solutions to accommodate every platform.

In order to move ahead,
you must have to share your screen via Brainmeasures's Screen Sharing Extension,
Click the below button to Process ahead.

Candidate Authentication
